name: Advanced Education with Viktor Strobovski
summary: You like to studying? You want to increase your math skills? In this game you need to solve few mathematical examples, and Viktor Strobovski will say what to do. Listen him attentively and do what he say. Difficulty of examples increased with each right answer, so don’t do mistakes, Viktor don’t like mistakes. Nobody like mistakes.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Survival, Educational
  • 发行日期: June 9, 2018
